mapper.insert: insert into EXAMS_STUDENTS(EXAM_ID,STUDENT_ID) select EXAMS.EXAM_ID,LESSONS_STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID from EXAMS LEFT JOIN EXAMS_LESSONS ON EXAMS_LESSONS.EXAM_ID=EXAMS.EXAM_ID LEFT JOIN LESSONS_STUDENTS ON EXAMS_LESSONS.LESSON_ID=LESSONS_STUDENTS.LESSON_ID where EXAMS.EXAM_ID=#{examID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

insert into exams_students_questions(EXAM_ID,STUDENT_ID,QUESTION_ID) SELECT EXAMS_QUESTIONS.EXAM_ID,EXAMS_STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID,EXAMS_QUESTIONS.QUESTION_ID FROM EXAMS_QUESTIONS LEFT JOIN EXAMS_STUDENTS ON EXAMS_QUESTIONS.EXAM_ID=EXAMS_STUDENTS.EXAM_ID WHERE EXAMS_QUESTIONS.EXAM_ID=#{examID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from EXAMS_QUESTIONS natural join QUESTIONS natural join EXAMS where EXAM_ID=#{examID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select EXAM_TITLE from EXAMS where EXAM_ID=#{examID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID,STUDENTS.STUDENT_NAME,CLASSES.CLASS_NAME,EXAMS_STUDENTS.SCORE from LESSONS left join LESSONS_STUDENTS ON LESSONS.LESSON_ID=LESSONS_STUDENTS.LESSON_ID LEFT JOIN STUDENTS ON LESSONS_STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID=STUDENTS.ID LEFT JOIN EXAMS_STUDENTS ON EXAMS_STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID=STUDENTS.ID left join CLASSES ON CLASSES.CLASS_ID=STUDENTS.CLASS_ID where LESSONS_STUDENTS.LESSON_ID=#{lessonID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and EXAMS_STUDENTS.EXAM_ID=#{examID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select * from EXAMS left join EXAMS_LESSONS ON EXAMS.EXAM_ID=EXAMS_LESSONS.EXAM_ID LEFT JOIN LESSONS ON LESSONS.LESSON_ID=EXAMS_LESSONS.LESSON_ID WHERE LESSONS.TEACHER_ID=#{teacherID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select * from EXAMS LEFT JOIN EXAMS_LESSONS ON EXAMS.EXAM_ID=EXAMS_LESSONS.EXAM_ID LEFT JOIN LESSONS ON LESSONS.LESSON_ID=EXAMS_LESSONS.LESSON_ID WHERE LESSONS.TEACHER_ID=#{teacherID,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY EXAMS.DEADLINE DESC

select EXAMS_LESSONS.EXAM_ID,EXAMS_LESSONS.LESSON_ID,LESSONS_STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID ID,STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID,STUDENTS.STUDENT_NAME,CLASSES.CLASS_NAME from EXAMS_LESSONS left join LESSONS_STUDENTS ON EXAMS_LESSONS.LESSON_ID=LESSONS_STUDENTS.LESSON_ID left join STUDENTS ON LESSONS_STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID=STUDENTS.ID LEFT JOIN CLASSES ON STUDENTS.CLASS_ID=CLASSES.CLASS_ID where EXAMS_LESSONS.EXAM_ID=#{examID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and EXAMS_LESSONS.LESSON_ID=#{lessonID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select EXAMS.EXAM_TITLE,EXAMS.DEADLINE,EXAMS_STUDENTS.SCORE from STUDENTS left join EXAMS_STUDENTS ON STUDENTS.ID=EXAMS_STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID LEFT JOIN EXAMS ON EXAMS.EXAM_ID=EXAMS_STUDENTS.EXAM_ID WHERE STUDENTS.ID=#{studentID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
